topics.body:
Random thought: in the original movies for ghost in the shell makoto had to be naked to be use thermo-optic camoflauge because you can't make your clothes invisible.

When we do eventually develop that sort of technology soldiers would either have to be wearing special armor for that or buck naked.  If you wore a hat that would be a dead giveaway.

Hopefully this isn't spoilers but Good luck trying to unlock the Rikku Campaign.
